lst.str: Treasury Secretary James Baker and Federal Reserve Board chairman Paul Volcker have told House leaders they were optimistic their debt strategy would work, but acknowledged the crisis could take a sharp turn for the worse, Congressional sources and U.

lst.str: If we write it all off and declare defeat, these countries will decay and wither on the vine," the Treasury Secretary said of an end to capital inflows that would follow debt relief.
